Shadow Wing::

She looked at Veratis. She felt a twinge of pain as her other wing 
stated to fall off her right shoulder. She growled and reached over 
her shoulder and ripped it off.  The deep red fluid started to flow 
down her shoulder and down her side. Her white fur was turning 
crimson from the blood. She threw down her wings and looked at 
Veratis. "So now I am a new life form." She growled. She wasn't sure 
quite what to do or what to make of all this. She lowered herself 
down on all fours. Her shoulders were dripping with the red fluid.
"So now that I am this...new form. Give me a new name.  I am no 
longer the bot Shadow Wing."  She looked down. "No...I am no longer 
the embodement of Shadow Wing. I am still who I am, but no longer 
what I was. Veratis, you made this change possable. I ask you...give 
me a name."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> (Sorry I missed yesterday, work had me busy.)

virus

are
> something new to translife." He had a flare for the obvious. the 
life form
> he'd been trying for so long to create was now a reality.
